statements: SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_plans;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM crop_rotation_plans WHERE plan_id = 1;
SELECT plan_id, crop_name, planting_date, crop_compatibility FROM crop_rotation_plans WHERE crop_name = 'Corn';
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_plans ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT crop_name, pest_management_strategy FROM crop_rotation_plans WHERE pest_management_strategy LIKE '%organic%';
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_plans ORDER BY plan_id DESC;
SELECT crop_name, planting_date FROM crop_rotation_plans WHERE crop_compatibility = 'Compatible' ORDER BY planting_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT crop_name FROM crop_rotation_plans WHERE pest_management_strategy LIKE '%organic%' AND planting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_plans WHERE crop_compatibility IN ('Incompatible', 'Neutral') AND crop_name LIKE '%Tomato%' ORDER BY planting_date DESC;
SELECT plan_id, crop_name, pest_management_strategy FROM crop_rotation_plans WHERE planting_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2023-01-01' ORDER BY crop_name, planting_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM CropCompatibility WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT crop_id, compatible_crops FROM CropCompatibility WHERE crop_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM PestManagement WHERE pest_name = 'Aphids';
SELECT pest_id, pest_name FROM PestManagement WHERE pest_name = 'Whiteflies';
SELECT * FROM CropCompatibility ORDER BY crop_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CropCompatibility WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT crop_id, compatible_crops FROM CropCompatibility WHERE crop_id > 10 ORDER BY crop_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM PestManagement WHERE LENGTH(pest_name) > 10 AND management_strategy LIKE '%organic%';
SELECT pest_id, UPPER(pest_name) AS pest_name_upper FROM PestManagement WHERE pest_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT MAX(crop_id) AS max_crop_id, MIN(crop_id) AS min_crop_id FROM CropCompatibility;
SELECT * FROM CropCompatibility;
SELECT crop_name, compatible_crops FROM CropCompatibility WHERE crop_id = 1;
SELECT pest_name FROM PestManagement WHERE pest_id = 2;
SELECT crop_name, compatible_crops FROM CropCompatibility WHERE crop_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM RotationPlan WHERE rotation_year = 2022;
SELECT * FROM CropCompatibility;
SELECT crop_id, crop_name FROM CropCompatibility ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM PestManagement WHERE pest_id = 2;
SELECT crop_name, compatible_crops FROM CropCompatibility WHERE crop_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM RotationPlan WHERE rotation_year BETWEEN 2020 AND 2022 ORDER BY pest_id ASC, plan_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM CropRotationPlan;
SELECT crop_name, compatibility_rating FROM Crop;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name FROM PestManagementStrategy WHERE pest_management_rating > 8;
SELECT crop_id, compatible_crop_id, compatibility_rating FROM CropCompatibility ORDER BY compatibility_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM CropRotationPlan WHERE rotation_year = 2022;
SELECT * FROM CropRotationPlan WHERE plan_id = 100;
SELECT plan_id, crop_id, rotation_year FROM CropRotationPlan WHERE rotation_year > 2020 ORDER BY rotation_year DESC;
SELECT c.crop_name, p.strategy_name FROM Crop c JOIN CropRotationPlan p ON c.crop_id = p.crop_id;
SELECT c.crop_name, p.strategy_name FROM Crop c JOIN CropRotationPlan p ON c.crop_id = p.crop_id WHERE p.pes_management_strategy = 'Organic';
SELECT c.crop_name, cc.compatible_crop_id, cc.compatibility_rating FROM Crop c JOIN CropCompatibility cc ON c.crop_id = cc.crop_id ORDER BY cc.compatibility_rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_rotation_plans;
SELECT crop_name, pest_management_strategy FROM crop_rotation_plans ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT crop_name, crop_compatibility FROM crop_rotation_plans WHERE crop_compatibility = 'High';
SELECT crop_name, crop_type FROM crops WHERE planting_season = 'Spring';
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM pest_management_strategies WHERE strategy_id = 1;
SELECT crop_name, crop_type, harvest_season FROM crops
SELECT pest_name, pest_type, damage_intensity FROM pests
SELECT crop_name, crop_type, harvest_season, planting_season FROM crops WHERE crop_type = 'Fruit'
SELECT crop_name, crop_type, planting_season FROM crops ORDER BY planting_season DESC

SELECT crop_name, pest_name, strategy_name FROM crop_rotation_plans INNER JOIN pests ON crop_rotation_plans.crop_id = pests.pest_id INNER JOIN pest_management_strategies ON crop_rotation_plans.pest_management_strategy = pest_management_strategies.strategy_id
